reviewText: All steps are very basic, not teaching any spins. Very good info. if you are very beginner. A little mislead on title but OK for newbie.

Okay so this DVD is a bit slower then the other WCS videos we have watched but it certainly was worth the money.  These are apparently professional competitive dancers and they really pour out their knowledge into this DVD.  Certainly not a product for beginners but instead for people looking to really master some key concepts and moves of the WCS.
